div.p: [Person]
Builds, operates, and maintains the IDP.
[Person]
Uses the IDP to ship and run applications.
[Software System]
(e.g., GitHub) The single source of truth for all code and configuration.
[Software System]
(e.g., GHCR) Stores and serves container images.
[Software System]
[Container: GitOps Engine]
Continuously reconciles the cluster state with Git.
[Container: CI/CD Engine]
Runs CI/CD pipelines to build, test, and package applications.
[Container: Code Quality]
Analyzes code for quality and security issues during CI.
[Container: Metrics] Collects and stores metrics.
[Container: Logs] Collects and stores logs.
[Container: Visualization] Visualizes metrics, logs, and traces.
[Container: Log Agent] Forwards logs from all nodes to Loki.
[Container: Policy Engine] Enforces policies on Kubernetes resources.
[Container: Secrets Backend] Manages secrets and sensitive data.
[Container: Secret Sync] Syncs secrets from Vault into Kubernetes.

g.text: Deployed applications consume secrets synced by
